Data: 12.30pm: South Africa win the toss and bat, they've included Janneman Malan and Kyle Verreynne for ODI debuts. Temba Bavuma is also fit to return, back in the No. 3 berth. Australia, meanwhile, have gone for something of a change-up in the middle order, with D'Arcy Short included as the spinning allrounder at No.7. That means no Ashton Agar, while Josh Hazlewood completes a Test-quali

Starc to Malan, OUT full and swinging, 143kph/89mph, did that hit him on the boot?? Nigel Llong immediately turned away from the appeal, but Finch reviews, and this could be a sensational start for Australia! Definitely hit the bat, but it looks as if it crashed into the toe first - and this is stone dead, if so. Yes, boot first, that's plumb, golden duck for Malan on debut! Sma
Starc to Bavuma, no run length ball, jumps a touch to hit Bavuma on the thigh pad, around leg stump
Starc to Bavuma, 1 run fullish and shaping back, flicked through backward square leg for the first SA run
Starc to de Kock, no run length ball, straightening down the line of middle and off, de Kock is fractionally on the wrong line but gets away with a thick inside edge into his pads
Starc to de Kock, no run fired in full, shaping back a touch on leg stump, de Kock gets in a bit of a tangle jabbing down in defence
Starc to de Kock, 2 runs fullish, 137kph/85mph and clipped neatly off the pads, they'll pick up a couple through

Hazlewood to Bavuma, FOUR runs pitched up in the channel, invites the drive and Bavuma accepts, drilling four through the covers! Decent chase from the fielder but he couldn't quite time his dive to reel it in
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run shaping away this time, not there for the drive and Bavuma leaves it be

Hazlewood to Bavuma, FOUR runs touch full, 134kph/83mph and skelped through extra cover once more! Not a half-volley, by any means, and some swing, too, but it shaped right into the meat of Temba's bat as he stepped out to drive
Hazlewood to Bavuma, 1 run shortish, 139kph/87mph and guided down towards third man
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run shortish, angled across from over the wicket, left alone
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run back of a length outside off, de Kock is across and taps the ball down square
Starc to Bavuma, 1 run lopes in and wangs the ball down at 147kph/91mph, curving back and hits the leading edge as Bavuma goes across the line, squirting for one into the covers
Starc to de Kock, no run pitched up, 142kph/88mph and tapped leg side
Starc to de Kock, FOUR runs pinged through the covers! Some back atcha from de Kock, nicely forward and freeing the arms to send a rasping drive to the rope
Starc to de Kock, 2 runs full and sliding leg side, 141kph and clipped off the pads through midwicket for a couple more
Starc to de Kock, no run pitched up, angling in with the arm, de Kock nudges towards mid-on

Starc to de Kock, 1 run length, 145kph/90mph and de Kock pokes, so close to dragging on! Still a little tentative here against Starc, but gets away with this, and they scamper the single as short fine leg comes around
Hazlewood to de Kock, 1 run on the pads and worked around the corner
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run lovely line, dragging Bavuma out as he looks to drive on the up again, beaten past the outside edge!
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run fullish, angling in at 136kph/84mph and tucked towards midwicket
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run pitched up in the channel, Bavuma opens the face as he drives, squirted behind square where Smith leaps on it to cut off the single
Hazlewood to Bavuma, 2 runs fullish and whipped behind square, fine leg has to come around and they get two
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run tight lines and defended coming across
Starc to de Kock, 3 runs full and straight and whopped off the pads through midwicket, Cummins gives chase
Starc to Bavuma, no run teasing angle, rising through past the outside edge as Bavuma stays back
Starc to Bavuma, no run pitched up, 141kph/88mph and Bavuma throws the hands, misses out on a booming drive
Starc to Bavuma, FOUR runs full, not much swing now, rifled through the covers for four! Beautifully timed by Bavuma, who just leans forward into this, sends a zipping drive to the rope
Starc to Bavuma, no run drops short, 143kph/89mph and flying through outside off stump, no stroke
Starc to Bavuma, no run full and whipped off the pads, a spoonful of sugar for Temba... who is annoyed to have picked out midwicket, for no return
Cummins to de Kock, 1 run back of a length outside off, 137kph/85mph and guided away through backward point for one
Cummins to Bavuma, no run short of a length, 143kph/89mph outside off and stabbed behind square, straight to Smith
Cummins to Bavuma, no run fullish, comes across and punches to mid-off
Cummins to Bavuma, no run short ball, leg side as Bavuma pulls and it sails through to Carey... Cummins went up for it, but there wasn't much support. Looks like it missed the glove
Cummins to Bavuma, 1 run length ball sliding in to the right-hander and worked away through midwicket
Cummins to de Kock, 1 run shortish outside off, de Kock drops back and chops one into the ground square on the off side
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run length on middle and leg, 136kph/84mph and de Kock shows it a straight bat

Hazlewood to de Kock, OUT oh Quinny... dabbles one to the keeper, South Africa's captain is gone! A respectable length ball in the channel, nothing more, but de Kock falls trying to open the face and run one behind square. Audible nick, straightforward take for Carey, Hazlewood does the business
Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run fired in straight, length delivery and he tucks it to midwicket
Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run in the channel, 138kph/86mph and tapped towards point as he comes across
Hazlewood to Verreynne, 3 runs gets too straight and he whips neatly through midwicket, timed into a gap and they'll pick up three
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run fullish, Bavuma comes across and punches to mid-off
Cummins to Verreynne, no run back of a length, good carry as Verreynne drops the hands
Cummins to Verreynne, no run length ball, sticks in the pitch a touch, spooned into the off side... but Cummins can't quite get there! That certainly seemed to hold up on the batsman
Cummins to Bavuma, 2 runs good length on the stumps and worked through the leg side as he closes the face
Cummins to Bavuma, no run shortish, 142kph/88mph outside off, defended into the off side
Cummins to Bavuma, 1 wide banged in down the leg side, Bavuma pulls and misses - but he'll have another chance, as it's called wide
Cummins to Bavuma, 1 wide dug in again, 141kph/88mph but too much bounce this time, Bavuma ignores and SA get one more to the total
Cummins to Bavuma, 3 runs pitched up at 146kph/91mph, Bavuma is timing the ball like a Swiss watchmaker today, strokes three more through the covers to finish a somewhat expensive over
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run shortish around off stump, Temba defends

Hazlewood to Bavuma, 2 runs dropped! Shanked over the on side, should be a simple take for Starc running back at mid-on, but he shells it! Coming over his shoulder but he was in position, got both hands to it, only to bar-of-soap it and give Temba a life!
Hazlewood to Bavuma, no run on the stumps and nudged to the on side
Hazlewood to Bavuma, 1 run shortish outside off and squirted behind square, not cleanly stopped and they steal one

Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run back of a length, Vereynne pulls, feather to the keeper gets one off the pocket! Brilliant spot from Nigel Llong, and Hazlewood knew something was fishy even as he celebrated. No review, and rightly so
Hazlewood to Verreynne, 1 wide short and leg side
Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run back of a length outside off, Verreynne taps the ball down

Cummins to Bavuma, OUT dragged on! Cummins strikes and this is already looking sticky for South Africa... Bavuma had been playing nicely but he's misjudged the bounce, maybe too close for the cut shot, too, and he cannons a thick bottom edge into his timbers. Off stump flat on its back, SA wobbling!
Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run length ball, 143kph/88mph and flicked uppishly into a gap leg side to get off the mark first ball
Cummins to Verreynne, no run touch back of a length outside off stump, steered towards point
Cummins to Verreynne, no run shortish, 138kph and zipping through outside off, left alone
Cummins to Verreynne, 1 run angling in at 143kph/88mph and flicked square, not far from a catching chance again - that's the SA fifty up, in the final Powerplay over
Cummins to Klaasen, no run banged into the deck and Klaasen moves across to leave outside off
Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run line and length around off stump, blocked
Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run pitched up and driven towards mid-on, did well to dig that out
Hazlewood to Verreynne, FOUR runs slapped through point! That was a nice bit of timing from Verreynne, picking up his first boundary
Hazlewood to Verreynne, no run short of a length and guided to backward point
Hazlewood to Verreynne, 1 run fullish length, 138kph/86mph and punched to the covers sweeper coming forwards
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run gets across on off stump
Cummins to Verreynne, 1 run dug in short, Verreynne is quickly on the pull for a single through square
Cummins to Klaasen, no run length on off stump, punched back down the track
Cummins to Klaasen, no run 142kph/88mph, more watchful stuff from Klaasen, defending back to the bowler
Cummins to Klaasen, no run fullish around off stump, pace off from Cummins and it's miscued towards midwicket
Cummins to Klaasen, no run short, 142kph and Klaasen jumps to angle a cross-batted chop into the turf by his feet
Cummins to Klaasen, no run tight stuff from the Postman, angling back in and steered to backward point - just a single off the over
Marsh to Verreynne, 1 run length ball, comes across and punches into a gap for one
Marsh to Klaasen, no run outside off, Klaasen rocks back and steers towards point
Marsh to Klaasen, no run fullish, 129kph/80mph and worked off the front pad, picks out midwicket
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run shortish and Klaasen sits back to lash a cut through point for one
Marsh to Verreynne, 1 run angled in with the arm, Verreynne whips another single through midwicket
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run flicked through backward square leg - quiet start for MMarsh, an over in binary
Short to Klaasen, 1 run over the wicket, floated up and worked for one
Short to Verreynne, 1 run on the stumps, Verreynne stays in the crease and clips with the spin

Short to Klaasen, no run flighted, skidding into the pads as Klaasen sweeps... Short liked it, but I thought it pitched outside leg. Finch, after some discussion, elects to review. Was that a googly? No, apparently the legbreak, and Hawk-Eye has it pitching just outside - umpire's call - and then spinning sharply past the wicket. So not a good review
Short to Klaasen, 1 run pushed through and clipped behind square on the leg side
Short to Verreynne, 1 run flattish and Verreyne punches down the ground
Short to Klaasen, 1 run lobbed up, worked with the spin for another single to finish Short's opening over. Respectable
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run pushed through and cut off the back foot
Zampa to Verreynne, 1 run again a touch short, Verreynne rocks back to chop through point
Zampa to Klaasen, no run finds a better length, punched to extra cover coming forwards
Zampa to Klaasen, no run lobs up the legbreak around off stump, driven to the infield once again
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run floated up on the stumps and Klaasen drives through mid-on
Zampa to Verreynne, 1 run googly, punched down the ground
Short to Verreynne, no run flat trajectory, nudged into the leg side
Short to Verreynne, no run googly, not picked, steered into the covers
Short to Verreynne, 1 run full on the pads, turned out to deep backward square
Short to Klaasen, 1 run tossed up, full and straight, whipped out to wide long-on
Short to Verreynne, no run drag-down, pulled round the corner but straight to short fine leg. Missed out
Zampa to Verreynne, no run rocks back looking to play through the covers, inside edges out towards mid-on
Zampa to Verreynne, no run low full toss on off stump, hacked to short midwicket via the inside half of the bat
Zampa to Verreynne, 1 run pushed through quicker, uses the feet to get back and carve through cover
Zampa to Klaasen, no run nudged out to midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, no run full on leg stump, clipped into the leg side but can't beat the diving Warner at short midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, no run fired through quicker, guided out to cover point
Short to Verreynne, 1 run shimmies down, clipping out to long-on
Short to Klaasen, 3 runs fired through outside off, carved wide of mid-off on the back foot. Finch bumbles back and just about cuts it off, bit of a village effort but managed to flick it back in
Short to Verreynne, 2 runs rocks back and slashes a cut shot behind square, Starc gets round to field
Short to Verreynne, 3 runs slides down the leg side, poor ball from Short, Verreynne gets down early to sweep and Marsh gets round to save a run on the dive
Short to Klaasen, no run rocks back and gets leg side of this, pressed into the covers on the back foot
Short to Klaasen, FOUR runs drops shot, Klaasen frees his arms and flays it through midwicket for four! Rubbish ball, dispatched with aplomb. First boundary since the 11th over
Starc to Verreynne, no run length ball in the channel, guided out to point
Starc to Verreynne, no run slightly full of a length on fourth stump, pushed out to mid-off
Starc to Verreynne, 2 runs length on leg stump, flicked away through midwicket, Short makes a good diving stop to his left
Starc to Verreynne, 1 run pushed uppishly towards Hazlewood at mid-off, they take on his arm and get through with relative ease
Starc to Klaasen, no run outswinger, slightly full of a length, steered into the off side
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run low full toss outside off, punched out to sweeper-cover
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run length outside off, cut out to deep cover point off the back foot
Zampa to Verreynne, 1 run pressed out to long-on
Zampa to Klaasen, no run defended towards mid-on with a full face
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run low full toss, forced out to long-on for a jogged single
Zampa to Verreynne, 2 runs half-volley outside off, slashed hard through extra cover for a couple
Zampa to Verreynne, 2 runs cut away to deep cover running round, the partnership moves to 49
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run steered out into the point region, they hare through for a sharp single to bring up the fifty stand. Good rebuilding job
Starc to Verreynne, no run full, tailing in with the angle. Dug out into the covers with minimal foot movement
Starc to Verreynne, 1 run full, in at the leg stump from wide on the crease. Clipped out to deep square leg, past square-leg umpire Adrian Holdstock taking evasive action!
Starc to Klaasen, no run low full toss, but he can only find mid-off in the circle
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run another single through the covers to bring up the 100, SA ticking over
Starc to Verreynne, 1 run steered down to third man on the fence. 88mph/141kph
Zampa to Verreynne, no run squirted back down the pitch via the inside half of the bat looking to drive through cover
Zampa to Verreynne, no run nudged to backward point
Zampa to Verreynne, 1 run full, punched out to long-off
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run played out to deep midwicket on the back foot
Zampa to Verreynne, 1 run tossed up, uses the feet and works down to long-on
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run full on off stump, clipped out to the right of mid-on who gets round and down to field
Cummins to Klaasen, no run length in the channel, pushed to mid-off with a straight bat
Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run length in the channel, steered down to wide third man
Cummins to Verreynne, no run length outside off, looks to slug through midwicket with no foot movement and is beaten! 88mph/142kph, Cummins can't believe it didn't clip a bail!
Cummins to Verreynne, no run short ball, ducks underneath it
Cummins to Verreynne, no run back of a length ball, swivel-pulled straight to square leg in the ring
Cummins to Verreynne, 1 run full and straight, clipped out to square leg elegantly. 89mph/143kph, good start to this spell from Cummins
Marsh to Verreynne, 1 run length, hint of width, steered down to third man
Marsh to Klaasen, FOUR runs fullish in the channel, forced down the ground through straight mid-on with a strong bottom hand and away for four to break the shackles!
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run forced out into the leg side via the inside half of the bat
Marsh to Verreynne, FOUR runs back of a length, bit of a drag-down and pulled away for four more!
Marsh to Verreynne, no run cutter in the channel, gets back to guide into the covers on the back foot
Marsh to Verreynne, 2 runs length on the hip, tucked out to square leg and they scamper back for a second
Cummins to Klaasen, no run short outside off, drops the hands and sways inside it
Cummins to Klaasen, no run fullish slower ball, wide of the off stump, mistimed towards short cover
Cummins to Klaasen, no run slightly full of a length, steered into the covers
Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run length ball on fourth stump, driven wide of mid-off for an ambled single
Cummins to Verreynne, no run slower ball, yorker-length outside off, jams the bat down on it
Cummins to Verreynne, no run short ball, shapes to pull, Carey goes up for the caught-behind... but Nigel Llong decides there's no bat involved. Lucky to get away without that being called wide
Marsh to Klaasen, no run fullish and straight, clipped out to short midwicket
Marsh to Klaasen, 2 runs cutter on the stumps, clipped out to midwicket and they get back for a couple
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run back of a length, pulled out to deep square
Marsh to Verreynne, no run hard length on fourth stump, can't beat mid-on
Marsh to Verreynne, no run length ball, punched out into the covers
Marsh to Verreynne, 1 run short ball, latches onto it early and pulls hard but can't beat Zampa at deep square
Cummins to Verreynne, 1 run length in the channel, steered down to third man
Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run back of a length, nudged out to point on the bounce and they scramble through for a quick single
Cummins to Verreynne, no run length outside off, looks to hoick through midwicket but can only cue-end to the man in the ring

Cummins to Verreynne, OUT banged in halfway down, pulled hard but straight to Mitch Marsh at square leg in the ring who takes a sharp catch! Verreynne misses out on a debut fifty, and Cummins has 100 ODI wickets! That was the dismissal Cummins was bowling for, short ball didn't quite get up and Marsh reacted quickly to snaffle the chance
Cummins to Miller, no run short ball to start, Miller ducks under it
Cummins to Miller, no run length ball pushed across him, dangles the bat but can't make contact
Zampa to Klaasen, no run length ball, rocks back and carves into the covers
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run fullish, defended into the covers and Miller makes an early call for a single
Zampa to Miller, 1 run legbreak, full and straight, clipped out to deep midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, no run quick, flat legbreak, punched out to short extra cover on the back foot. Slight fumble, but no single
Zampa to Klaasen, no run fullish on fifth stump, defended into the covers
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run low full toss on the stumps, driven out to long-off
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run length ball in the channel, forced out into the covers
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 2 runs length outside off, pulled hard in front of square, but Short gets round to his left to cut it off

Hazlewood to Klaasen, FOUR runs slightly back of a length outside off, it sits up and Klaasen hoicks it over midwicket, a touch straight and in the air this time, over the rope after a couple of bounces
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run slightly full and tighter to the off stump, doesn't get up much off the pitch and flies through the gap between Klaasen's bat and pad
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 1 wide speared down the leg side
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run length in the channel, guided to Smith at point with an open face
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 3 runs length on off stump, pulled hard in front of square and Short gets round well again, pulling it in off the rope to save a run
Zampa to Klaasen, no run tossed up on the stumps, clipped out to short midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, no run driven into the covers, can't beat the man in close
Zampa to Klaasen, no run pushed through quicker towards leg stump, clipped to short midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper-cover
Zampa to Miller, 1 run yorker length on off stump, dug out to wide long-on

Zampa to Klaasen, FOUR runs flatter, but too short, and Klaasen nails this through midwicket to four to bring up an impressive fifty! Needs to keep on trucking, but has looked increasingly fluent as his innings has gone on
Hazlewood to Miller, no run full and straight, defended out towards cover
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run clipped out to straight midwicket, race through for a single
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run back of a length, nudged back down the pitch
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run tailing yorker on off stump, looks to be crashing into the bottom of off stump but Klaasen just about digs it out, inside edging into his front boot
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run length ball angling in, defending back down the pitch
Hazlewood to Klaasen, FOUR runs worked down the ground, beats the dive of mid-on inside the ring, gorgeous straight drive and Klaasen has four more!
Zampa to Miller, no run flighted, bit of spin and it strikes the front pad with Miller propping forward... Inside edge? Umpire Holdstock not taken with the appeal
Zampa to Miller, no run floated up on the stumps and worked to leg
Zampa to Miller, 1 run full and drifting, flicked off the pads past the dive of midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run slightly slower, the legbreak straightens on middle and leg, clipped through square playing back
Zampa to Miller, 1 run tossed up nice and slow and worked through the leg side
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run pushed through, Klaasen walks across and nudges another single off his pads towards short fine leg
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run length ball in the channel, stabbed through the covers coming forwards
Starc to Miller, no run full on off, 141kph/88mph and punched towards extra cover
Starc to Miller, 1 run full and shaping back in a touch, clipped off the pads through backward square
Starc to Klaasen, 2 runs pace off from Starc, offcutter in the channel and Klaasen is a fraction early on it, chipped over cover for a couple
Starc to Klaasen, no run length ball, nibbling a touch as the batsman comes forward and defends with an open face
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run shortish outside off and steered through backward point from the crease
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run looped up wide of off stump and punched along the ground to wide long-off
Zampa to Miller, 1 run flighted, sweeps hard with the spin, just a single out to deep square leg
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run tossed up on the stumps and worked to midwicket
Zampa to Miller, 2 runs worked away fine on the leg side and they will come back for a couple as the boundary rider runs around
Zampa to Miller, 1 run lobbed up on leg stump and taken on the full as Miller steps out, clipped to long-on
Zampa to Klaasen, no run pushed through and clipped firmly but straight to midwicket
Starc to Miller, FOUR runs spanked! Just a touch full and wide from Starc, and it's eased through the covers off the front foot for Miller's first boundary. Classy stuff
Starc to Miller, no run pitched up, 142kph/88mph and slightly tighter to off stump, can't extend the arms this time and bunts to extra cover
Starc to Miller, no run some tail for Starc, 142kph and scudding into the pads as Miller shuffles across... heading leg side, though
Starc to Miller, no run banged in short outside off, 137kph/85mph and he drops the hands
Starc to Miller, no run full on off, Miller is moving smoothly to whip off his front pad, picks out midwicket this time
Starc to Miller, no run back of a length on off and jabbed down watchfully, good finish to the over from Starc
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run shortish outside off and slapped through the covers
Marsh to Miller, no run angled across from over the wicket, 131kph/81mph and tapped back on the leg side
Marsh to Miller, 1 run wicket-to-wicket stuff and worked through midwicket
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run comes across and punches down the ground to long-on
Marsh to Miller, 2 runs back of a length and nudged off the hip, looked like a tight second... but Miller runs well to beat the throw from deep backward square
Marsh to Miller, 1 run length ball on the stumps, Miller nudges one through mid-on
Hazlewood to Miller, 2 runs good length, worked off the legs again, they'll hustle two - that's the 50 stand between these two

Hazlewood to Miller, no run edged but short of the keeper! Pitched up and drew an expansive drive, Carey went full length to his left... but it didn't quite carry. Looks like it was an offcutter, so lack of pace saved Miller
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run angled across and this time he drops back to steer behind point
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 1 run fired in, 139kph/87mph full-bunger on off, Klaasen chops down late and direct it through mid-on for a single
Hazlewood to Miller, FOUR runs steps out and thrashes this through the covers! A show of intent from Miller, who disdainfully belts Hazlewood off his length
Hazlewood to Miller, 2 runs full toss, whacked low through cover point and the man in the deep has work to do
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run shortish and swatted away on the pull
Marsh to Miller, no run back of a length, Miller pokes off his hip but finds the man at midwicket prowling inside the ring
Marsh to Miller, no run done by the slower ball, beats the bat with Miller committed... Another cutter and it gripped appreciably
Marsh to Miller, 1 run pace off again, fullish length and driven down he ground to long-off
Marsh to Klaasen, SIX runs heaved over the leg side! Short-arm pick-up from Klaasen and he sends it soaring up and over the deep midwicket rope for a dismissive six!
Marsh to Klaasen, 1 run dabbed into the covers and they scuttle through - decent over for SA, with the final Powerplay approaching
Hazlewood to Klaasen, no run short of a length and tucked to leg
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 1 run comes across and works a single around the corner
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run short of a length, Miller rocks back and dabs this off the face down to third man
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 1 run drops short again, worked through the leg side
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run dug in, 139kph/87mph and Miller rolls his wrists on a pull for one
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 1 run pitched full on off, 138kph and punched to long-on
Zampa to Klaasen, no run bounces in and sends down a legbreak on middle and leg which is swatted to midwicket
Zampa to Klaasen, 2 runs pushed through, Klaasen is forward and swipes fine of long-on for a couple - SA raise the 200 in the 40th over
Zampa to Klaasen, 1 run floated up, Klaasen is forward again and dinks through the covers

Zampa to Miller, 4 leg byes tossed, outside leg stump and Miller sweeps, did he get bat on it? Zampa was appealing for lbw, but that was optimistic. Runs very fine and Cummins can't cut it off, goes down as leg byes, though
Zampa to Miller, 1 run comes down and swipes through mid-on
Zampa to Klaasen, 2 runs drops short, Klaasen it back in the crease and crunches a couple in front of the cover sweeper
Short to Miller, 1 run pushed through, short outside off and Miller throws the hands, misses out as he hits the man in the ring but they pinch one
Short to Klaasen, 2 runs flighted, rolled out on middle stump, worked off the front pad and into a gap for two
Short to Klaasen, 1 run lobbed up and clipped towards deep midwicket
Short to Miller, 1 run gives this a bit more flight, outside off and worked against the turn for one more to the midwicket fence
Short to Klaasen, 1 run flatter and tucked off the pads
Short to Miller, 1 run drifting leg side and Miller flicks it out towards deep midwicket, they think better of trying to take on the arm
Zampa to Miller, no run flattish legbreak, worked off leg stump to midwicket
Zampa to Miller, SIX runs advances, hits through the line, smooshed over long-on! An easy-breezy golf swing over the ropes, first six of the day for Miller
Zampa to Miller, no run pushed through and he defends from the crease
Zampa to Miller, no run tries to come down again, Zampa fires this in and he can only dig it out back to the bowler
Zampa to Miller, no run fired through outside off, he can't get under it and Zampa fields in his follow through again
Zampa to Miller, 1 run floats up the legbreak this time, worked away with the spin through midwicket
Short to Miller, no run dragged down and Miller rasps a cut in front of square, brilliantly cut off by the diving Smith at extra cover. Superb work
Short to Miller, 3 runs whipped leg sided, they push hard for two... and a misfield allows them to come back for a third, raising the 100 stand between this pair!
Short to Klaasen, 1 run tossed up and flicked into the leg side
Short to Miller, 1 run shortish from Short, spinning away and cut off the back foot
Short to Klaasen, 1 run punched into a gap coming forwards... again they are sniffing for a second, but won't get it this time
Short to Miller, 1 run flighted, worked into a gap leg side, settle for one
Starc to Miller, 1 run full length and punched into the covers coming across

Starc to Klaasen, SIX runs short ball, top-edged on the pull... flies all the way to the unguarded fence at fine leg! Probably a good thing he didn't get it where he was aiming, as deep backward square would have been in the game
Starc to Klaasen, no run slung full and wide, fading away from the right-hander, who fails to connect
Starc to Klaasen, no run hammers a length, 140kph/87mph and Klaasen jabs at it defensively
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run full and whipped away through the leg side
Starc to Miller, 1 run back of a length, 143kph/89mph on the stumps and nurdled into the leg side
Cummins to Miller, 1 run touch full, 138kph and met with a punch wide of cover as he comes down
Cummins to Klaasen, 2 runs slower ball, full outside off and he waits for it, clips back past the bowler for two as long-on runs around
Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run short outside off, Klaasen is up on his toes and swats through point to the sweeper

Cummins to Miller, 1 run slower-ball bouncer from Cummins, Miller is forward and then has time to think about four different shots before shovelling through midwicket for one - that's fifty for Miller, at almost a run a ball. Vital knock for his side
Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run length, stroked into a gap in the covers, Klaasen just a couple away from his own milestone
Cummins to Miller, 1 run tries to come down and swipes aggressively through the line to long-on
Starc to Miller, no run fired full and wide, maybe a touch lucky to get away with that... kissed the tramline with Miller on his heels and swiping at thin air
Starc to Miller, 1 leg bye length, scudding into the back leg, Starc goes up for lbw... No interest from the umpire, maybe too high. Miller was looking to swing that into next week
Starc to Klaasen, 1 run full and tailing away wide of the stumps, 142kph/88mph and squirted down to third man... on to 99 now, but Klaasen will want that all-important flake
Starc to Miller, no run short ball, loopy outside off and it completely flummoxes Miller, who looks to the square leg umpire... Starc lucky to get away with that, too
Starc to Miller, FOUR runs slings down a low full-toss, hammered through the covers! Miller latches on and powers it to the fence!
Starc to Miller, 1 run pitched up and clipped for one through midwicket, Miller keeps the strike
Cummins to Miller, 1 run pitched up, slower ball on off stump and stroked down the ground

Cummins to Klaasen, 1 run shortish outside off, Klaasen clips through square leg and immediately clenches his fist... Maiden ODI hundred for Heinrich Klaasen, off comes the helmet as he celebrates with his team-mate. He's red as a beet, it's been hot, hard work, but he's dug SA out of trouble with a fine knock
Cummins to Miller, no run short ball, pace off and Miller swings hard, fails to connect
Cummins to Miller, no run length, another cutter going away from Miller, who swipes and misses again
Cummins to Miller, 1 run full ball, pace on, 139kph/87mph and Miller chops an inside edge past his stumps
Cummins to Klaasen, SIX runs smeared down the ground! Klaasen nails Cummins at last, creaming a baseball blow over long-on, picked the offcutter and got plenty of bat on it. SA still brawling
Hazlewood to Miller, no run in the channel, again Miller aims to heave over the leg side and fails to connect!
Hazlewood to Miller, no run back of a length, cutter from Hazlewood and Miller is defeated again, swings and misses as the ball dips past off stump
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run low full toss, 135kph/84mph on leg stump and glanced to short fine leg
Hazlewood to Klaasen, FOUR runs scooped for four! Klaasen upping the tempo now, moves across early and takes it on the full, down towards fine leg
Hazlewood to Klaasen, 3 runs shorter, he's looking to target the same area, ramped high over short fine leg, but this one plugs in front of the rope
Hazlewood to Miller, 1 run on the stumps and whipped into a gap leg side - again just the one boundary off the over
Cummins to Miller, FOUR runs Miller time! At last... Picks the slower ball, smokes it down the ground! Just bounces in front of the rope, a good start to the over for SA

Cummins to Miller, OUT short ball, follows the batsman as he goes across... flapped to the keeper! Miller looking to get cute with the ramp but ends up inside-edging a simple catch to Carey! Been a bit of a struggle at the death, but still an important innings after the strife SA were in
Cummins to Phehlukwayo, no run short of a length, another offcutter and Lucky is bamboozled, dangling his bat out but can't connect

Cummins to Phehlukwayo, OUT moves across, exposing all three stumps... jabbed into the leg side and Klaasen wants on, Phehlukwayo is going to be short here! Brilliant from Cummins, fielding in his follow-through to his left, turning and throwing down the stumps with the batsman nowhere!
Cummins to Klaasen, 2 runs punched through the off side, they'll come back for two
Cummins to Klaasen, FOUR runs full and wide, squirted to third man! Aiming for the tramlines with a cross-seamer but Klaasen chopped it through the infield for another welcome boundary
Starc to Maharaj, 2 runs full and wide from round the wicket, Maharaj bullocks a couple in front of the cover sweeper
Starc to Maharaj, 2 wide 144kph/89mph but fired down the leg side... and Klaasen spots the opportunity to steal the strike by running a bye, too. Smart work
Starc to Klaasen, 1 bye jumps across, goes for the switch hit, low full toss from Starc... and Klaasen misses, but they run a bye anyway!

Starc to Maharaj, OUT timber! Torpedoes off stump! Outta the ground and Maharaj is outta there... Having struck with his first ball, Starc has to wait until his 57th to pick up a second wicket with a classic yorker
Starc to Nortje, 1 run full outside off, sliced towards backward point and they scamper through
Starc to Klaasen, 2 runs full and straight and he miscues a slog, straight up over the keeper... but Carey can't get there running back! Bit of luck for Klaasen, but he's earned that today

Starc to Klaasen, 2 runs short of a length, slower ball to finish and pulled down the ground... Anrich Nortje will scramble back to the danger end for a second, Klaasen completing a very respectable salvage job for SA

A cracking effort from Klaasen, who more than doubled his previous ODI best of 59. That total is certainly much more competitive than looked likely when SA were 48 for 3, with Klaasen and the debutant Kyle Verreynne in the middle. But that partnership helped light the way, before a stand of 149 from Klaasen and Miller gave them plenty to bowl at. Australia have some firepower of their
Right, here we go again, and some funk to start with - Keshav Maharaj, in only his fifth ODI, has the new ball in hand. David Warner on strike
Maharaj to Warner, no run tossed up and tapped back down the track
Maharaj to Warner, no run nicely flighted, lots of overspin on off stump, Warner punches back down the track
Maharaj to Warner, 1 run darted on the stumps, hangs back and clips one through square
Maharaj to Finch, no run flattish outside off and swiped into the covers
Maharaj to Finch, no run darted a little quicker on the stumps and Finch can only jab to short midwicket - one off the opening over
Nortje to Warner, FOUR runs hits a hard length to start with, Warner throws his hands at it and pierces the gap between point and third man! Brutal start
Nortje to Warner, no run length ball, bit of nip in, nudged out to cover. 88mph/142kph
Nortje to Warner, 1 run slightly full of a length, steered down to third man
Nortje to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, Finch rides the bounce and punches towards point
Nortje to Finch, no run flays into the covers with minimal foot movement, but the fielder at short cover gets down to stop it well
Maharaj to Warner, 1 run flipped out into the midwicket region for one
Maharaj to Finch, FOUR runs checked inside-out punch over the covers, away for four! Finch gets motoring with an elegant loft over the infield
Maharaj to Finch, 1 run backs away, getting very legside of the ball, and directs it towards straight extra cover for one
Maharaj to Warner, 1 run clipped off the pads out to deep midwicket for an ambled single

Maharaj to Finch, 1 run ooft, not far away! Thick edge from Finch looking to guide it out to point off the back foot, bottom edged into de Kock's knee but he couldn't get his glove down in time to grab it
Maharaj to Warner, 1 run tucked out to keep the strike
Nortje to Warner, 1 run bit of width, steered down to third man on the fence
Nortje to Finch, 1 run slower ball on a length, nudged out to midwicket
Nortje to Warner, 2 runs straight length ball, Warner rocks back to swivel-pull out to the sweeper
Nortje to Warner, 1 run back of a length, runs it down to third man with an open face. Warner wants to hurtle back for a second, but Finch sends him back
Nortje to Finch, no run 87mph/140kph, length ball nipping in which Finch inside-edges into his back thigh
Nortje to Finch, 1 run short outside off, Finch pulls into the leg side for a single to short fine leg
Ngidi to Finch, 2 runs length outside off, seizes on the width to force it through backward point, Shamsi gets round from third man to cut it off

Ngidi to Finch, OUT no foot movement, flashes at it outside off stump, and feathers an edge behind! Finch departs early, throwing his hands at a back-of-a-length ball in the channel. Bit of extra bounce perhaps, struck the top edge as he look to flay a cross-batted shot through cover point, and the gleeful de Kock takes the catch!
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run cutter outside off, Smith shuffles across and works into midwicket via the inside half of the bat

Ngidi to Warner, FOUR runs outswinger on a length, thick edge from Warner looking to steer through point and it flies away for four! The man from slip had moved into the covers, and it races away to the fence
Ngidi to Warner, no run slightly full of a length, struck on the pad. Ngidi goes up convincingly, but it's definitely pitched outside the leg stump, and they decide against the review
Ngidi to Warner, no run length ball pushed across him, driven out into the covers
Nortje to Smith, no run width outside off, Smith flays into the off side with a straight bat but can't beat the infield
Nortje to Smith, no run length ball on fifth stump, Smith gets across to defend
Nortje to Smith, 1 run half-volley outside off, squirted out to deep backward point with an open face
Nortje to Warner, FOUR runs but Nortje's back-of-a-length ball is too straight, and Warner pulls it easy round the corner for four behind square. Deep in the crease, just rolls the wrists on it
Nortje to Warner, no run length outside off, flashes hard at it but can't beat point with the cut shot
Nortje to Warner, 1 run length on the pads, tucked out to deep midwicket
Ngidi to Warner, no run fullish and pushed across him, hacked out to mid-on via the inside half of the bat
Ngidi to Warner, 1 run steered down to third man for a jogged single
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run slightly full of a length outside off, Smith shuffles across and works through midwicket for one
Ngidi to Warner, 1 leg bye slightly full of a length, flicked off the pads out to midwicket
Ngidi to Smith, no run length outside off, Smith shifts over to the off stump looking to drive through cover but Miller in close makes a superb diving stop to cut it off
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run yorker length on sixth stump, dug out to cover where Phehlukwayo misfields, and Smith will keep the strike. Ngidi unimpressed
Nortje to Smith, no run hard length outside off, squeezed out into the covers
Nortje to Smith, 1 run full outside off, uses the feet to wander down the track and clip to mid-on
Nortje to Warner, 1 run back of a length, steered down to third man with an open face

Nortje to Smith, FOUR runs bumper, Smith picks the length up so early and has all the time in the world to swat it behind square leg for four! Quality batting, beats short fine leg in the ring and the sweeper running round had no chance
Nortje to Smith, no run driven out into the covers, can't beat the fielder
Nortje to Smith, 2 runs length on off stump, flicked out to deep midwicket for a couple
Ngidi to Warner, 1 wide strays down the leg side, can't get bat on it
Ngidi to Warner, no run length ball pushed across him, driven straight to mid-on
Ngidi to Warner, 1 run full on off stump, tip-and-run out to mid-off for Warner
Ngidi to Smith, no run hard length outside off, pressed to short cover on the bounce
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run Smith shuffles across, nudging to mid-on and setting off immediately for a scurried single. Puts the fielder, Malan, under pressure, and he can't gather cleanly

Ngidi to Warner, OUT chipped to the man in the covers, who takes a low catch and celebrates! Warner isn't going anywhere in a hurry... we're going upstairs, but the soft signal is out, which is so often important. Verreynne is the catcher... looks like he's jammed his fingers underneath the ball to me. These things always look worse in slow-motion. We're onto our second angle, w
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run nibbles away outside off stump and beats Smith's bat
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run length ball in the channel, fenced out to the cover fielder, Klaasen, who hurls down the stumps at the non-striker's end, but Labuschagne was always in safely
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run length outside off, flashed hard down to Shamsi at wide third man
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, FOUR runs short and wide, Labuschagne jumps onto the back foot and cuts hard in front of square for four!

Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, FOUR runs short and wide again, driven sweetly through the covers for four more! Rocks onto the back foot, lifts the front leg while getting on top of it, and slashes it away for four. Just like a right-handed Mike Hussey
Ngidi to Smith, 1 leg bye clipped down to long leg off the thigh pad
Ngidi to Labuschagne, no run length in the channel, defended towards mid-on
Ngidi to Labuschagne, 1 run length ball, guided down to third man with an open face
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run cutter in towards the top of leg stump, clipped down to long leg
Ngidi to Labuschagne, no run length ball, tucked out to short midwicket
Ngidi to Labuschagne, no run steered out to cover point, only three off the over

Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run cutter, sliding down the leg side, clips him on the pad as he shuffles across. Phehlukwayo lets out an ambitious, vociferous appeal, but that's surely very unlikely... hang on, de Kock reviews! Looked nowhere near to me on first viewing... no bat involved, impact outside, and missing a second set! One of the worst reviews I've ever seen!
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run slashed down to deep backward point
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 run cutter, worked out to square leg for one
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run fenced out to backward point, can't beat the fielder
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run cutter outside off, dabbed down to Shamsi at deep backward point
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 2 runs hard length outside off, dabbed down to third man for a quick couple
Ngidi to Smith, no run length ball, defended back to the bowler... Ngidi throws down the stumps but Smith had made his ground comfortably
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run length ball, shuffles across to clip out to deep backward square
Ngidi to Labuschagne, 2 runs length ball, keeps low, Laboosh tucks it out to midwicket for a couple
Ngidi to Labuschagne, 1 run length outside off, carved out to deep cover
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run driven towards cover for another ambled single
Ngidi to Labuschagne, no run length outside off, shapes to drive through the covers but only manages to inside edge towards midwicket. Ngidi grimaces, intriguing battle between these two
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run nudged into the covers, can't beat the fielder
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run length on fourth stump, clipped out to short midwicket where Miller flies round to field
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 run dabbed down to deep backward point for one more
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run cutter, late cut down to deep backward point
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 run short ball, strays down the leg side and Laboosh latches onto it early, swivel-pulling out to deep backward square
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run in the slot on off stump, flicked uppishly to mid-on on the bounce
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run clipped down the ground past the bowler
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run straightens on a length, pushed past short midwicket into the leg side for one
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run driven through cover for an easy single
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run rocks back in his crease, nudging down to long-on's right

Maharaj to Smith, 1 run leading edge towards short cover, but it falls just short of David Miller in close! Skipped down the track looking to work a full leg-stump ball into the leg side, strong leading edge, but didn't quite carry
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run full on leg stump, leading edge out towards wide gully but falls safely... Labuschagne mirroring Smith, not for the first time!
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run length outside off, Smith unfurls a cover drive but only manages to slash at thin air as the ball flies past the inside edge through to de Kock, much to Andile's chagrin
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run slower ball outside off, nudged out to mid-on
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 2 runs length outside off, Smith extends the arms and swings it down to square leg for a couple
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run length on fifth stump, pulled straight to short midwicket
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run full and straight, tucked off the pads down to square leg
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 run nudged out to cover to keep the strike
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run pushed through on the stumps and whipped against the spin through square
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run stands tall in the crease and whips down the ground
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run angled in from round the wicket and worked to midwicket
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, the Mighty Laboosh plays straight and clips to long-on
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run worked behind square, could be a tight one... but in the end Labuschagne didn't need to dive at the striker's end
Phehlukwayo to Smith, no run shortish, 131kph/81mph and flipped to the man in the ring on the leg side
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run back of a length and wide of the stumps, Smith opens the face to carve behind point, half-stopped by the fielder
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, no run legcutter from Phehlukwayo, holds in the pitch and breaks away as Marnus tries to dab it off the back foot and misses
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 run back of a length, pace on and whipped through square leg as he shuffles across
Phehlukwayo to Smith, 1 run shortish and sliced through point playing back
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 wide another slower ball, the offcutter, lands this one just about on the tramlines, with Labuschagne a long way across before letting it go... but called wide
Phehlukwayo to Labuschagne, 1 run slung down short and Laboosh pulls this through backward square leg
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run lobbed up around off stump, punched down to long-off
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run bit of grip and spin, Smith's through the shot but squirts a thick outside edge through the covers for one
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run tossed up and worked to leg
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run flighted, met coming forward and tapped down the ground to long-off
Maharaj to Smith, no run nicely bowled, again it holds up and spins as Smith pushes out and miscues into the covers
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run tossed up and driven through the off side
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run lobbed up and flicked with the spin through square leg
Shamsi to Labuschagne, 1 run bowling over the wicket, drops a touch short and Labuschagne rocks back to pull for one
Shamsi to Smith, 2 runs worked with the turn around the corner, into a gap and they hustle for two, bringing up the Australia 100
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run pushed through quicker on the stumps, tapped square of the man at midwicket
Shamsi to Labuschagne, 1 wide grip and spin for Shamsi, Labuschagne flicks at it down the leg side, into the keeper's gloves... and signalled wide
Shamsi to Labuschagne, no run tossed up nice and full, Laboosh sweeps and drags it past his stumps via an under-edge
Shamsi to Labuschagne, no run slows his pace up, full around off stump, punched back down the track
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run floated up wide and driven through the covers as Smith crabs out
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run flatter, punched down the ground off the back foot in front of off stump
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run tossed up straighter, worked through mid-on
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run darted outside off and Labuschagne punches square coming across
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run driven down the ground to long-off
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run floated up full and Smith lashes one more through the covers
Shamsi to Smith, 2 runs nicely flighted, slow and dipping and whipped away square on the leg side with the spin
Shamsi to Smith, no run tossed up full outside off, Smith clears the front leg... and belts it back to the bowler, Shamsi down quickly to field
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run flighted, straightening on leg stump, nurdled around the corner
Shamsi to Labuschagne, no run nudged off the front pad to square leg
Shamsi to Labuschagne, no run tossed up full and Laboosh goes for the full-blooded sweep, can't get it past backward square
Shamsi to Labuschagne, 1 run very full and this time it's paddled behind square for one
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run flatter and straightening, gets a slight leading edge playing back
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run pushed through on the stumps, worked behind square
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run tossed up straight and driven through mid-on for a single
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run wheels away, prodded into the leg side
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run tossed up full outside off, Marnus is forward and strokes one more through long-off
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run flat trajectory and worked away through square leg - still no boundaries since the Powerplay for Australia
Shamsi to Smith, no run accurate stuff, worked to the leg side
Shamsi to Smith, no run flighted, on middle and leg and worked around the corner
Shamsi to Smith, no run lets go a full toss, but Smith can only bunt it limply back to the bowler
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run tossed up and nudged off the front pad

Shamsi to Labuschagne, no run is that a missed stumping chance? Tough one for de Kock, skidded through low down the leg side, but he couldn't gather it cleanly! Although, to be honest, these two aren't currently hurting SA, so why bother changing things? Cunning, Quinny
Shamsi to Labuschagne, 1 run lobbed up and worked with the spin behind square
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 3 runs drifting leg side, Laboosh flicks it behind square with a roll of the wrists and Phehlukwayo is up too quickly, has to run around
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, pushed through mid-on
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run slows his pace right up, Labuschagne waits on it, worked into a gap at midwicket
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run Smith steps out and strokes one down the ground to long-off
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 2 runs flicked into a gap leg side and they scamper hard to come back for two
Maharaj to Labuschagne, no run flighted, straightening on leg stump, Labuschagne closes the bat face a touch too early
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run lobbed up full and whipped away through the leg side
Shamsi to Labuschagne, no run tossed up and punched to mid-off
Shamsi to Labuschagne, 1 run flighted, worked through mid-on as he comes forward
Shamsi to Smith, 2 runs full and flighted as Smith walks down, chips deliberately back over the bowler's head, gets it very straight for a couple
Shamsi to Smith, no run floated up on leg stump and whipped to square leg
Shamsi to Smith, no run sharp spin, past Smith's inside edge, de Kock gathers down the leg side... just flicked the pad on its way through
Maharaj to Labuschagne, 1 run flattish outside off and swatted through the covers
Maharaj to Smith, 2 runs miscued, in the air but wide of the diving Maharaj! Bit of a leading edge but it squirts away down towards long-on - half-century for Smith, not looked fluent but on he goes
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run punched through the off side
Maharaj to Marsh, no run pushed through, spinning on middle and off, Marsh defends cautiously
Maharaj to Marsh, 1 run on the stumps, Marsh stands tall and dabs through mid-on
Shamsi to Marsh, no run tossed up full and straight and tucked towards midwicket
Shamsi to Marsh, no run flighted, spins as Marsh closes the face and squirts the ball to square leg
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run wrong'un from Shamsi, skidding on outside off as Marsh dangles the bat and taps into the covers
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run lobbed up and whipped down the ground for one more to long-on
Shamsi to Marsh, 2 runs slows his pace up and Marsh nearly chips to midwicket, lands just out of reach and then skedaddles into the deep for a couple
Shamsi to Marsh, FOUR runs timing, Mitch... floated up on off, Marsh just presses out and strokes past mid-off for four. First boundary since the 10th over, a welcome sight for Australia
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run tossed up and clipped down the ground
Maharaj to Marsh, 1 run flat outside off as Marsh goes back and stabs one more through point
Maharaj to Smith, no run tossed up and straightening on off, driven back to the bowler
Maharaj to Smith, 1 run drifting towards leg, Smith works inside to out through mid-off
Maharaj to Marsh, no run pushed through on the stumps
Maharaj to Marsh, 1 run stays back and punches a drive through cover point
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run flattish, maybe the googly and there's width outside off for Marsh to cut
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run flighted, rolled out on middle stump, worked through midwicket
Shamsi to Marsh, no run tossed up outside off and poked into the covers
Shamsi to Marsh, no run flighted, spinning sharply into the front pad... Shamsi likes it but umpire Holdstock is unmoving. Maybe doing too much to hit leg stump
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run tossed up around off stump, punched into the covers
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run floated up full around off stump, Smith bottom-hands a punch back past the bowler, despite him getting a hand on it
Nortje to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, nibbling through as Smith chops down and fails to connect
Nortje to Smith, no run squared up a touch and tapped down into the covers
Nortje to Smith, 1 run shortish around off stump, Smith rides it and punches to the cover sweeper
Nortje to Marsh, 1 run comes across and runs this behind square on the off side
Nortje to Smith, 1 leg bye slower ball, Smith shuffles around in the crease and deflects behind square on the leg side
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run tossed up on the stumps and flicked with the spin
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run floated up full on leg, worked in front of square
Shamsi to Smith, 2 runs clipped off the hip, Smith is running back to the danger end as deep square fields... Smith put in the dive, but he looked home and hosed
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run tossed up straight and nurdled through midwicket once again. Rinse and repeat
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run length ball, worked off the pads through square
Shamsi to Smith, 1 run tossed up full on off, Smith chips down the ground towards long-off
Nortje to Smith, 1 run short and quick in the channel, sliced on the cut down towards third man
Nortje to Marsh, 1 run pitched up, 139kph/87mph, Marsh is across and drives to the cover sweeper
Nortje to Smith, no run full, slower ball on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
Nortje to Smith, no run fired in full, 148kph/92mph and tailing late, Smith does well to dig this out into the leg side
Nortje to Smith, 1 run pitched up at 140kph and dinked towards mid-on for a scampered single. Good comeback from Nortje after the boundary first ball
Ngidi to Smith, no run pitched up outside off, bunted to cover
Ngidi to Smith, FOUR runs full toss, shanked through midwicket for four more! Poor ball and Smith dispatches it to the rope
Ngidi to Smith, 1 run in the channel, steered through backward point
Ngidi to Carey, no run angled across, good length and steered down into the off side
Ngidi to Carey, no run back of a length and Carey chops down in defence

Nortje to Smith, OUT pinned on the pad, Nortje strikes and Smith is a goner! He asks Carey whether it's worth the review, but it looks fairly adjacent as Smudger trudges off! Length ball, decent bounce off the pitch. Smith was deep in the crease, looking to work through the leg side and pinned on the top of the pad. Might have been tight on height, but it's given, and that's a
Nortje to Short, no run defended into the covers
Nortje to Short, 2 runs crunched out through extra cover for a couple to get up and running
Nortje to Short, no run length ball in the channel, Short slashes at it but can't get bat on it. 89mph/144kph from Nortje, who glares in D'Arcy's direction in anguish
Nortje to Short, 1 run short ball, pulled awkwardly out to midwicket for an ambled single
Nortje to Carey, no run guided out to point, can't beat the fielder
Ngidi to Short, 1 wide strays down the leg side, given wide
Ngidi to Short, 1 run length slid across him, driven aerially out to sweeper-cover after a couple of bounces
Ngidi to Carey, no run pushed across him, slightly straighter line and driven out to short cover
Ngidi to Carey, no run low full toss but Carey misses out, only pushing it back to the bowler on the bounce
Ngidi to Carey, no run hard length, fended into the covers where Klaasen is on it in a flash
Ngidi to Carey, no run full on off stump, dug out back down the pitch. Ngidi gathers in his follow-through and hurls it in the direction of the stumps
Ngidi to Carey, no run length ball, tucked out to short midwicket on the bounce
Phehlukwayo to Short, 1 run length ball on the stumps, swung round the corner for one down to long leg
Phehlukwayo to Carey, 1 run length on fifth stump, nudged out to cover for a sharp single. Carey wants a second on the overthrow, but it's never there
Phehlukwayo to Short, no run slapped back down the pitch on the bounce, Associated Press gathers off his own bowling
Phehlukwayo to Short, 1 run cutter hung outside the off stump, carved out to sweeper-cover
Phehlukwayo to Carey, 1 run full outside the off stump, dug out to the sweeper on the cover fence

Phehlukwayo to Short, FOUR runs length outside off, heaved up and over long-on, one bounce and over the rope! Short gets underway, hacked down the ground with a closed face. Not quite out the middle, but more than enough meat on it to fly away for a much-needed, pressure-relieving boundary
Ngidi to Carey, no run hard length, no width, and squeezed out to point on the bounce
Ngidi to Carey, 1 run hard length on off stump, steered behind point for a single
Ngidi to Short, no run heaved back down the pitch
Ngidi to Short, no run pushed across him, carved out to point on the bounce
Ngidi to Short, 2 runs slower ball, full on the stumps. Clipped out to mid-on, and they get an overthrow after Phehlukwayo hurls it in waywardly
Ngidi to Short, no run length ball, struck back down the pitch and Ngidi gathers in his follow-through
Phehlukwayo to Carey, 1 run length on the hip, tucked out to long leg
Phehlukwayo to Short, no run length in the channel, hacked out to cover
Phehlukwayo to Short, 1 run slower ball which grips in the surface, nudged uppishly out to long-on after a couple of bounces
Phehlukwayo to Carey, 1 run back of a length ball, Carey is jumping back in the crease and pushes out into the covers
Phehlukwayo to Short, no run length outside off, slashed out to extra cover on the bounce
Phehlukwayo to Short, 1 run slightly full of a length on the stumps, turned out to midwicket
Shamsi to Short, no run length ball, decent turn. Short rocks back and carves it away but can't beat cover
Shamsi to Short, 1 run sits deep in the crease and thumps this out to the sweeper-cover
Shamsi to Carey, no run steered out to cover on the back foot, straight at the fielder
Shamsi to Short, 1 run decent turn from a length, heaved out to cover
Shamsi to Starc, 1 run rocks back and cuts this out to deep point to keep the strike
Phehlukwayo to Starc, no run driven out to mid-off, straight to the fielder
Phehlukwayo to Starc, no run slashes at a length ball outside off and can't make contact
Phehlukwayo to Starc, no run wide yorker, Starc clears the front leg looking to flay through extra but can't connect
Phehlukwayo to Starc, 1 run full outside off, squeezed out to point on the bounce and they get through for a quick single
Phehlukwayo to Short, 1 run slower-ball bouncer, waits on it and pulls to deep midwicket on the fence
Phehlukwayo to Starc, 1 run inside-edged into the leg side, they squeeze through for one more

Shamsi to Starc, no run turns on a length, straight to Miller at short cover, bounces up sharply off the square and smacks him in the mouth! Think he's OK, but he's having a fiddle with a few teeth to make sure everything is in order.
Shamsi to Starc, 1 run yorker length, looks to go inside-out but can only loft to long-off on the bounce
Shamsi to Short, no run yorker length, Short can only dig it out back to Shamsi
Shamsi to Short, 1 run rocks onto the back foot and carves into the covers
Shamsi to Starc, no run clears the front leg looking to go over midwicket, but toe-ends it to short midwicket on the bounce

Shamsi to Starc, 1 run tossed up on fourth stump, toe-ended out to Miller at short cover who hurls towards the non-striker's end and it would have been out with a direct hit, but he was off-balance, and he misses by a fair few inches
Phehlukwayo to Starc, no run offcutter in the channel, Starc doesn't pick it and is through the short early

Phehlukwayo to Starc, OUT length outside off, Starc bottom-edges through to de Kock on the bounce who throws at the base of the stumps and runs him out! Direct hit, Starc was wandering down the pitch, unaware of where the ball was and hoping for a single, and de Kock seized upon the opportunity. South Africa closing in...
Phehlukwayo to Cummins, no run length in the channel, guided to point with an open face
Phehlukwayo to Cummins, no run nagging line on fourth stump, worked to midwicket

Phehlukwayo to Cummins, FOUR runs straight and in the slot, Cummins clears the front leg and thrashes it dead-straight down the ground! Frees the arms, mooses it over mid-on with a couple of bounces before the rope
Phehlukwayo to Cummins, no run cutter outside off, hacked to short midwicket on the bounce
Shamsi to Zampa, no run struck on the pad, Shamsi belts out an appeal, Holdstock says no! No reviews left after that Phehlukwayo howler, and looked like it was sliding down regardless
Shamsi to Zampa, 1 run strays down leg, Zampa gets down to sweep and gets plenty of bat on it
Shamsi to Cummins, 1 run swung hard round the corner down to long leg
Shamsi to Zampa, 1 run brings out the reverse, the cheeky devil, but can't beat the fielder at point
Shamsi to Cummins, 1 run shifts across to the off side, and slog sweeps to deep square

Phehlukwayo to Cummins, OUT pace-off outside the off stump, slogged miles up into the air, and Verreynne takes a screamer running in from long-on! Covers acres of ground coming in off the rope towards mid-on, diving forward, no doubt about the legality this time, grabbing it an inch or two off the turf, and Cummins has to trudge off. Superb from Verreynne, his third catch of th
Phehlukwayo to Zampa, 1 run backs away, Phehlukwayo follows him, and Zampa pushes down to long-on for a single
Phehlukwayo to Hazlewood, no run length outside off, Hazlewood throws the kitchen sink at it but can't get bat on ball
Phehlukwayo to Hazlewood, no run low full toss outside off, looks to drive through the off side and flashes at thin air
Phehlukwayo to Hazlewood, 1 run cutter outside off, carved cross-batted to wide mid-off
Phehlukwayo to Zampa, FOUR runs slower ball on a length, Zampa cracks this out of the middle and it lands just short of the rope at midwicket. Awesome sound off the bat!

8.35pm So a convincing 74-run win in the end for South Africa. Australia lost their last seven wickets for just 43 runs, failing comprehensively to build on Smith and Labuschagne's partnership. The asking rate continued to climb after the powerplay, as that pair tried to take the game deep, but both of them got out at an awkward time, leaving a tricky scenario for new batsmen on a pit
South Africa won by 74 runs
Player of the match is Heinrich Klaasen, SA
